title: Bikepacking Roots Summer Fundraiser Giveaway!
content:
Bikepacking Roots is running a summer fundraiser giveaway with heaps of swag and prizes up for grabs. Let’s take a look at what the non-profit is giving away!

Bikepacking Roots is the only national 501c3 non-profit specifically dedicated to supporting and advancing the sport of bikepacking, growing a diverse bikepacking community, advocating for access to and protection of public lands, and creating and maintaining high-quality routes.

To raise money, they need our help! Here’s where your money is going:

Your contribution will help Bikepacking Roots:

  • Grow its Regional Stewards Program of bikepacking leaders around the country to support local community building at a grassroots level.
  • Expand the Community Routes Project to showcase a diverse collection of routes from more regions, routes accessible to riders of different experience levels, and routes that more folks can fit into their lifestyles.
  • Continue the popular educational initiatives like our Bikepacker’s Guide webinar series.
  • Broaden its capacity to engage in advocacy to support bikepackers and protect the places we ride.
  • And so much more!

Join Bikepacking Roots as it fosters an inclusive bikepacking community, one adventure at a time.

  • A Salsa Timberjack SLX 29 ($2,099 value)
  • A 3.5-day bikepacking trip into the Ute Mountain Ute Tribal Park from Four Corners guides ($1,195 value). Alternatively, value can be applied to any bikerafting course.
  • A 3-day custom guided bikepacking tour from Boulder, Colorado from Alter Exploration ($1,250 value)
  • A $500 gift certificate for cycling apparel or accessories from Albion
  • A BarYak Expedition with Upcycled Harness with Bikepacking Roots Logo, or a gift card for $225 for other great gear from BarYak. ($259 value)
  • 2 prize packs featuring a branded Titanium Mug, a Revelate Mountain Feed bag and a Revelate Mag-tank ($150 value each)
  • Each $25 donation gets you an entry into our awesome prize giveaway! All of our current sustaining members (monthly, quarterly or annual recurring donors) will also receive automatic entries.
  • As an added bonus, we have some awesome Bikepacking Roots merch available as thank you gifts!

If you can, donate today at Bikepacking Roots.
